message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I think I deserve a little more, don't you?
Okay, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think 50/50 is fair. Let's compromise.
You're going down, I'm not changing my mind!
Okay, Bob, I'm getting tired of this.  Let's just split it 50/50 and be done with it.  If you keep refusing, we're both going to lose money.

Alright, Bob, I'm willing to go down to 48, but I'm not giving you any more than that. This is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing money with each round.
I can wait, you're the one losing value
Bob, we're both losing out here.  Let's compromise. I'm willing to go down to 46, but I won't go lower.  We can't keep this up!
